title: Ep. 11 - 2 Bears 1 Cave 2 w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Tom Segura is appearing from Europe via hologram and Bert Kreischer is very down in weight! It's 2 Bears 1 Cave! Do you have wild hiking thoughts? Is making out cheating? These questions and more are answered. Plus, an appearance by Whitney Cummings after a "viewing" sparks some questions. Bert and Tom talk about So Over October with Christina P and LeeAnn Kreischer, and we ask "Who cooks ONE egg?"
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
